message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with image processing and computer vision techniques for separating reflected and transmitted layers in photographs taken through a glass surface. This falls under the domain of computer vision and image processing, which is covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Given the focus on image processing and computer vision, cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also deals with texture analysis and modeling, which is covered by cs.GR. The use of Gaussian Mixture Model patch prior and Bayesian inference techniques suggest that the paper may also be relevant to cs.MM and cs.AI. Finally, the use of user-guided annotation and sparse cues suggests that the paper may also be relevant to cs.LG.
